name: Heaven or Hell (eFko)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

The game was inspired by old games such as SuperMario, Tetris
We wanted to do a total remake of 5 games but unfortunately, there was no time...

Your mission is to defeat the god who shut down your internet in hell and get it working again. But you have to go through game heaven because everything can die and games can too.

INFO : Boss have 60 lifes

CONTROLS:

Move - A, D;

Jump - W;

Interaction - E;

Attack - Space

Pause - ESC or TAB for WEB PLAYER

Mouse for clicks;

DEVELOPERS

Deiw - SoundFX, Music

eFko - Programming, Level Desing

DevLazy - Graphics, Concepts

PROGRAMS

Unity, Aseprite, Audacity, FL Studio 20, 

This game was made for MiniJam 119.
